Content:

The only rediculous idea here would be to assume that this is something new.

Author: henning
Content:
Very cool, although I could do without the music.

I guess that's one drawback to hacking on software instead of hardware: you can't make a cool video your family and friends could watch about coding modular interpreters in Haskell with monads. :/

Author: dcurtis
Content: I think I'd say its more like Chuck E Cheese than a nightclub.
